text:
Hey Richard !! Sorry about the delayed reply 
We were running on a skeleton crew due to the holidays and ended up having to do a lot of firefighting. lol

An ad for a toothpaste is it ? Nice !! 
That’s good advice . 
I remember my group project . My team and I got too ambitious and didn’t have safety shots . 3 out of 4 ended up failing cause everything was incomplete. Fortunately my scores in the other modules were good enough to compensate for that . But scary times . 
So yeah that’s a really good approach :) 
Btw I spoke to a couple of my friends who happen to be comp supervisors / leads and told them I might be asking them for some feed back on your comp work soon.

That being said , it’s good that you are learning other aspects of vfx as well . Btw what year of the course are you in atm? I don’t remember if you told me that . 
This is not your final project is it ?
